abstract: Michael Carpenter, a former Citigroup executive, is the new chief of GMAC, which sought to postpone a decision on the terms of its next federal bailout.
snippet: Michael Carpenter, a former Citigroup executive, is the new chief of GMAC, which sought to postpone a decision on the terms of its next federal bailout.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  GMAC Financial Services, the former lending arm of General Motors, replaced its chief executive on Monday as it negotiates for another round of bailout financing from the federal government.

headline.main: A Change at the Top of GMAC as It Negotiates for Another Government Bailout
headline.print_headline: A Change at the Top of GMAC as It Negotiates for Another Government Bailout
